## Required Packages

The required packages for the data_pull.R code are *TADA*, *tidyverse, leaflet, scales,* and *sf.* Installation for the *TADA* and *tidyverse* packages can be found in the Data Pull Guide. Here are the lines to install and load these packages:

```{r}
#| output: false
# install.packages('leaflet')
library(leaflet)

# install.packages('scales')
library(scales)

# install.packages('sf')
library(sf)

library(TADA)
library(sf)
```
